activity.title: ohcnetwork/care_fe#13066
activity.text:
@Jacobjeevan I would like to work on this issue

![Image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/7fbb452b-e41d-4031-b247-7f9e30cd45c5)

The issue was caused because the archived_by field was not being serialized in the API response.
This has now been resolved by
• Adding archived_by to the perform_extra_serialization() method in FileUploadListSpec.
• Updating the frontend to refetch the file details after archiving to get the updated archived_by info.
